description:
Matthijs Kooijman discovered that AsyncSSH server did not properly handle
authentication under certain conditions. An attacker with a specially
crafted client could use this vulnerability to skip authentication of SSH
sessions.

python-asyncssh.description: asyncio-based client and server implementation of SSHv2 protocol

title: AsyncSSH vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: AsyncSSH would allow unintended access via a crafted client.
